name: Cat-Eared Slime
text: Look at that, the key actually fit!

name: Cat-Eared Slime
text: You know how cats like climbing into containers that you'd think they barely even fit in?

name: Cat-Eared Slime
text: Well I find those animals to be terribly silly.

name: Cat-Eared Slime
text: We slimes would never do such a thing.

name: Cat-Eared Slime
text: We slimes would never do such a thing. Never.

name: Cat-Eared Slime
text: We slimes would never do such a thing. Never. Ever.

name: Cat-Eared Slime
text: We slimes would never do such a thing. Never. Ever. ...

name: Cat-Eared Slime
text: Except we do it all the time.

name: Cat-Eared Slime
text: You don't know what I'm talking about?

name: Cat-Eared Slime
text: You must be dizzy from falling down into this cave.

name: Cat-Eared Slime
text: We're slimes. Getting into places others could never get to is pretty much our signature.

name: Cat-Eared Slime
text: Man. It must suck probably having gone by all those places you could have explored, if you just did the most natural thing a slime could do.
